introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service govern your use of DIFRNT COMPOUND's website and services. By using our services, you agree to these terms.

services.content: We provide web development, design, and IT solutions. Our services include:

userObligations.title: Your Obligations
userObligations.content: When using our services, you agree to:

Use our services in compliance with applicable laws

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: DIFRNT COMPOUND strives to provide high-quality services but cannot guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation.

contact.title: Contact Us

introduction.title: Einführung
introduction.content: Diese Nutzungsbedingungen regeln Ihre Nutzung der Website und Dienstleistungen von DIFRNT COMPOUND. Durch die Nutzung unserer Dienste stimmen Sie diesen Bedingungen zu.

introduction.title: Introductie
introduction.content: Deze Servicevoorwaarden regelen uw gebruik van de website en diensten van DIFRNT COMPOUND. Door gebruik te maken van onze diensten gaat u akkoord met deze voorwaarden.

contact.title: Contact
